Caesar Butter


Ingredients
2 sticks butter, softened
1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese
1 tablespoon chopped parsley
2 teaspoons anchovy paste
1 teaspoon ijon mustard
1 teaspoon lemon juice
1/2 teaspoon lemon zest
1 clove garlic, finely minced or grated
1/2 teaspoon kosher salt
1/4 teaspoon pepper

Cooking Instructions

Combine butter, Parmesan cheese, parsley, anchovy paste,
mustard, lemon juice, lemon zest, garlic, salt, and pepper
in a bowl and stir very well until evenly incorporated.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour and up to 1 month.
Alternatively, Shape butter mixture into a log and roll in
parchment or plastic wrap before refrigerating. Slice as
needed.
